  • gauss
  • View page source

gauss

pyrit.toolbox.QuadratureToolbox.gauss(order: int, left: float = 0, right: float = 1) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray]

Returns weights and points for Gauss-Legendre quadrature on the interval [left,right].

Parameters

  • order (int) – The order of the quadrature rule.

  • left (float, optional) – Left border of the interval. Default is 0

  • right (float, optional) – Right border of the interval. Default is 1

Returns

  • weights (np.ndarray) – (N,) array. The weights of the quadrature rule.

  • points (np.ndarray) – (N,) array. The points of the quadrature rule.

Notes

The weights \(w_i\) and points \(x_i\) are used as follows: \(\int_a^b f(x) dx \approx \sum_{i=1}{N} w_i f(x_i)\)
